name: Sky Driver (jocolloman)
description:
This project was created to be the basis of an assignment for an Intro to Unity course I taught at the beginning of 2023. I intend to release the project and materials after the course has completed.

This project was developed almost entirely live on stream. You can watch my development process here: https://youtu.be/a0VTMRpqbZU

The source code is available here: https://github.com/jcollard/3D-action-racer
